initBlock.name: User Org Hierarchy Level
tags: Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Sales Pipeline Snapshot

selectStatements.query:
SELECT NVL( MAX(FIXED_HIERARCHY_LEVEL )-1 ,0) from DW_CXS_SALES_RESOURCE_CF_DN_DH , DW_USER_D 
where DW_CXS_SALES_RESOURCE_CF_DN_DH.BASE_RESOURCE_ID=DW_USER_D.party_id
and DW_USER_D.USERNAME=':USER'
